description: From international scientific vocabulary, reflecting New Latin combining forms: amoeb- +â€Ž -iasis.

entries.meaning: (biology, medicine, uncountable) Disease associated with the presence of amoebas.

definitionGroups.group: (biology, medicine, countable) Any of various such diseases; most especially:

entries.meaning: (medicine) An infectious disease caused by the parasitic protozoan Entamoeba histolytica; amoebic dysentery.
